member.name: M:SparseMatrices.Tools.MyRandom.getBinary(System.Double)

Randomly returns:
zero with zeroProb probability
one with 1 - zeroProb probability
member.param: Probability of returning zero (range - from 0 to 1)

The main entry point for the application. Initializes main window.
